headline: Ventas Earns Nareit 2024 Healthcare "Leader in the Light" Award
summary: CHICAGO, November 20, 2024--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) today announced that it has earned the 2024 Nareit "Leader in the Light" award for the Healthcare sector in recognition of its superior and longstanding sustainability practices. This is the eighth time Ventas has received this important recognition.
